ui

Class AdvanceAssemblyLineHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.UseCaseHandler
      • ui.AdvanceAssemblyLineHandler

  • public class AdvanceAssemblyLineHandler
extends UseCaseHandler
    Defines the program flow for the 'Advance Assembly Line' use case.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Construct a new AdvanceAssemblyHandler.

      Advance the assemblyline if it can be advanced.

      Indicates if the user is authorized to be part of the use case.
      void showCurrentAssemblyLine()
      Show the user the current assemblyline.
      void showFutureAssemblyLine()
      Show the user what the assemblyline would look like if he succesfully advances the assemblyline.

      • AdvanceAssemblyLineHandler

        public AdvanceAssemblyLineHandler(UIFacade UIFacade,
                          AssemblyLine assemblyLine,
                          Clock clock)
        Construct a new AdvanceAssemblyHandler.
        Parameters:
        UIFacade - The UIfacade this AssembleHandler has to use to communicate with the user.
        assemblyLine - The assemblyline the user will advance.
        clock - The clock used by the given assemblyline.

        public void showFutureAssemblyLine()
        Show the user what the assemblyline would look like if he succesfully advances the assemblyline.

      • advanceAssemblyLine

        public void advanceAssemblyLine()
        Advance the assemblyline if it can be advanced. Show which benches are preventing the assemblyline from advancing.
